basics.name: Sathis

basics.summary: This is Sathish, having 1.9+ years of experience in web based software products using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Angular 9+, Go and MongoDB. During this span of time I have gathered new requirements from customers and introduced them into the product as-well-as have worked in the productâ€™s bug fixing, also developed my skills in manual testing of complete products. work.name: Logikoof Technologies Pvt Ltd
work.summary: I learned the concept of web based programming and started to implement in real world applications. I was in 2+ product development, learned the complete product and i started learning to talk with clients for new features, also simultaneously developed new features as well as working in bug fixing. Also i have worked in manual testing.

projects.name: Project Management Tool
projects.description: Project management tool is a web based software designed to help project teams to plan a project, track and manage the projects the to achive the defined project goals within the time. It also helps team members to collabrate effectivily and accelerate the projects to meet the specified constraints.
responsibilities: Gethering the project requiremnts from clients and prepare the concept.
Integration with UI using Application gateway (API) with the modules and payloads in the JSON format.
Collabrate with product team members to implement new features.
Standarize all output with a new, tresponsive and strategy.
Interaction with clients by giving various demo of the developed applications.

projects.name: Smart Municipal
projects.description: This projects deals with the problems of waste management in smart cities, where the garbage collection system is not optimized. Smart waste management is about using technology and data to create a more efficient waste industry. Smart waste management aims to optimize resource allocation, reduce running costs, and increase sustainability of waste service.
responsibilities: Get project requiremnts and prepare the concepts.
Integration with UI using Application gateway (API) with the modules and payloads in the JSON format. Also write APIs for this project
Collabrate with product team members to implement new features.
Bug fixing, Manual testing and Standardized all output with a new, tresponsive and strategy.
Tracking the Vehicle and Property location using Google Maps (Markers, Animations, Info Window, Ploygons and Polylines, Styles)
Interaction with clients by giving various demo of the developed applications.
